data.body: uninstall_cmd() in scripts/install.sh only removes runtime, state, and launcher paths but not ~/.config/foolery/ which contains registry.json, settings.toml, logs/, and version-check.json. This causes stale state to persist across uninstall/reinstall cycles.

data.title: Fix foolery uninstall to clean up app state data (~/.config/foolery)
